paragraph:
Hi! I'm Riyad and I do Front-End Development and UX Design. My Multidiscplinary degree has allowed me to delve into both the arts and the computing world as they're very much intertwined thanks to the Internet. 

 I made this website with React JS, in a social media style newsfeed format. You can scroll down below to see my projects from university and the projects I am currently working on as well in brief, if you'd like to learn more, I'd love to discuss it over Zoom/Google Meet/Microsoft Teams! I am always trying to keep myself occupied with projects whether they succeed or fail, it helps me learn from my mistakes and grow from there.
